name: Slow Cooker Venison Chili for the Big Game
author: XFREYJAX
summary: Venison chili is a big hit our house during the holidays and football season!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chiles
3 tablespoons chili powder, or to taste
1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese for garnish
directions: Place the venison and sausage in a large skillet and cook, breaking up with a wooden spoon as necessary, over medium heat until no longer pink and evenly browned
Stir in the onions and garlic, and cook until aromatic, about 3 minutes
Drain, and mix in the tomato paste
Season to taste with hot pepper sauce, salt, and pepper
Pour the cannellini beans and tomatoes into a slow cooker
Cover, and cook 8 to 10 hours on Low, or 5 hours on High
Sprinkle each serving with shredded Cheddar cheese
